article.text: There is no main textbook for the class. However, you may use materials from the following books as a reference. Lecture slides and additional reading materials will be provided on the class website.
Book 1: Introduction to Data Mining by Tan, Steinbach and Kumar, Addison Wesley (2006) Sample chapters of the book are available >>>HERE<<<
Book 2: Mining of Massive Datasets by Leskovec, Rajaraman, and Ullman, 2nd Edition, Cambridge University Press (2014), available >>>HERE<<<
